reviewText: My kids love it and Wild Kratts itself is a great show;  If you're already a fan, these are awesome episodes, worth having.
The writing has improved tremendously. I enjoy sitting down with my children to learn about animals with them!
My 4 year old loves African animals so this DVD was a hit! It has 4 episodes about zebras, elephants, lions, and rhinos.
A must if you love Wild Kratts
Grandson loves all of there movies
Great DVD! Always has so much learning in the videos.
My grandson loves Wild Kratts, so this was a great purchase.
My son loves the Kratts brothers.
